Darkfate::

"What luck!!!" said Darkfate "We're rescuing our allies from that 
base's stasis field... before I'd have enough to trhow trainers out 
the area... but now I want... erm... destroy them... " the male 
opened his comm link "Do you have spark signature in order to my 
troops can know that we're working together... By now?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> As all the blasts convrged on hellpeon, the Infecticon laughed. 
> Before any of them struck him the field of Chaochitan energy once 
> again surrounded his body as each shot struk the massive beat 
> creating a large explosion. Once again as the smoke cleared the 
being 
> seemed unphased that is until Darkfate flew up to him and spoke. 
> Before the blast he fired sturck the bot it seemingly flew down 
> straight at the trainers base, if it hit the shields it would 
likely 
> be a devestating hit if it hit the ground it would leave a very 
large 
> crater. The being turned to Darkfate and tilted its head to the 
side.
> 
> Hellpeon: "...Warrior? I am the Infecticon Enforcer Hellpeon... As 
> for an alliance my leader may consider it if you help destroy that 
> base and all in it..."
>
